name: Jaz Sharks Bay
description: Featuring a modern design this All Inclusive resort offers an extensive freshwater pool and shopping arcade. It is 5 minutes drive from Sharm El Sheikh Airport and 10 minutes drive from sandy Red Sea beaches. Furnished balconies or terraces are offered in all air conditioned rooms which overlook the sea or garden. Each Sol Y Mar room has a flat screen TV and a minibar. Sol Y Mar Sharks Bay provides a buffet restaurant serving worldwide favorites all inclusive for breakfast lunch and dinner. Seafood and international dishes can be enjoyed outdoors and cocktails are offered in the lobby bar. Guests can work out in the hotel state of the art fitness centre or explore inland with desert safaris or camel riding trips. A shuttle service to the beach is also provided.
address: 2 B Entrance of Sharks Bay,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Grand Oasis Resort
description: This 4 - star - all - inclusive resort is located within the world - famous Ras Mohammed National Park. This hotel is superbly located and enjoys the spectacular backdrop of the South Sinai Mountains. It is just a short walk from the crystal blue waters of the Red Sea. Covering an area of 116 000 square meter - the resort offers a wide range of facilities throughout its glamorous complex and boasts a total of 433 deluxe rooms and 2 suites - ranging from single - double - rooms to the superior option of a suite. It caters for a wide range of guests from holidaymakers and honeymooners to business corporates. Rooms come with balconies or patios overlooking the garden or pool or sea. Each has satellite tv and a minibar. Bathrooms include make-up mirrors and hair dryers. The Hotel Spa offers a broad variety of body treatments reflexology - moroccan bath - massages and a fully equipped gym with excellent workout machines. Guests can relax in the steam bath - sauna or hot tub and there is a rooftop rest area with parasols. The Spa is on three levels with two swimming pools - one indoor and one outdoor. The hotel provide a fabulous variety of meals and snacks and there are even more options to try at some of the finest restaurants close by Soho Square at discounted prices. The hotel is just a short walk from the Soho Square famed for its nightlife - restaurants - bars -live shows and shopping
address: Sharks Bay, Sharm Al Shiekh,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Safir Dahab Resort
description: At Dahab Resort, exceptional service and top-notch amenities create a memorable experience for guests. Complimentary internet access is available in the resort to ensure you stay connected during your visit.Arrange your trips to and from the airport using the resort's convenient transportation services booking. Complimentary parking is available for guests. Continuously receive the support you require through front desk amenities such as concierge service and safety deposit boxes.At the resort, their tours can even assist you in booking tickets and securing reservations for leisure activities and adventures. At the resort, utilize the convenient laundry service to maintain your preferred travel attire fresh, allowing you to pack lighter. Craving relaxation? In-room amenities such as 24-hour room service and room service allow you to maximize your time spent inside the room.For the health and well-being of all guests and staff, smoking is restricted exclusively to assigned zones.Accommodations come equipped with all the conveniences required for a restful night's slumber.A selection of rooms at Dahab Resort come furnished with air conditioning to cater to your needs and comfort.A few accommodations at Dahab Resort also include unique design elements like a balcony or terrace.A few chosen rooms are equipped with daily newspaper, television, in-room video streaming and cable TV to ensure guest amusement. In certain rooms, the resort offers visitors access to a coffee or tea maker and mini bar. Dahab Resort offers a hair dryer and bathrobes in the restrooms of specific accommodations. A delightful breakfast is the perfect way to begin your day, and at Dahab Resort, you can always indulge in a scrumptious meal on-site. Allow your journey to be free from the pangs of hunger! On-site eateries offer delicious and accessible meal choices. At Dahab Resort, guests with diverse dietary needs are accommodated by offering options like halal among the different types of cuisine.An evening spent within the resort's bar and casino may prove to be just as entertaining as venturing out with your fellow adventurers.Are you inclined to prepare your own dishes? You will surely appreciate having the on-site BBQ facilities available.At Dahab Resort, guests can take pleasure in the delightful recreational amenities provided for their entertainment. At the resort, a truly unique characteristic is the private beach that grants immediate sea entry solely for its valued visitors.Conclude your days in complete tranquility by paying a visit to massage, salon, steam room, spa and sauna for ultimate relaxation. At Dahab Resort, a wide array of amenities guarantees a fulfilling experience throughout your visit. Make your holiday truly memorable by taking a rejuvenating plunge into the pool. At the resort fitness center, you have the option to engage in your daily exercise routine or simply alleviate your jet lag by breaking a sweat.
address: El Nasr Rd,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Herrmes Hospitality
description: With a stay at Herrmes Hospitality in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Red Sea and Naama Bay. This aparthotel is 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Naama Bay Beach and 5.9 mi (9.5 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre. Take in the views from a garden. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Delta Sharm Resort,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Le Royale Collection Luxury Resort
description: Private beachfront, 3 pools with Spanish mosaic tiling and a dive centre are available at this 5-star Naama Bay resort. Its luxuriously appointed rooms feature 42” LCD TVs and Art Déco furniture.Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Outdoor balconies or terraces and marble bathrooms can be found in each of Le Royale Sharm El Sheikh’s rooms. Rooms are serviced twice daily and room service is available 24/7. Sharm El Sheikh Sonesta Luxury Resort has extensive health club facilities including a hot tub, massage rooms and sauna. Sinai Grand Casino offers a variety of table games. Piano Bar features wine and live music, while Byblos Pool Bar serves exotic cocktails and light snacks. Guests can enjoy Italian cuisine in the hotel’s extensive gardens at La Gondola. Staff at the hotel’s tour desk can arrange excursions to Ras Muhammad National Park, which is 15 km away. Le Royale Sharm El Sheikh Sonesta is 10 minutes’ drive from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport.
address: شارع السلام شارم الشيخ, South Sinai Governorate, Egy,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Jaz Fayrouz
description: Near Cleo ParkAll-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Grab a bite at Al Wadi Restaurant, one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafes. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the swim-up bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and facials. After dipping into one of the 4 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge).Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a 24-hour front desk. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.With a stay at Jaz Fayrouz in Sharm El Sheikh, you'll be 4.4 mi (7.1 km) from Naama Bay Beach and 7 mi (11.2 km) from Shark's Bay Beach. This beach hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Naama Bay and 3.3 mi (5.4 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre.Make yourself at home in one of the 210 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.
address: Peace Road,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Sharming Inn Hotels - Couples and Families Only
description: With a stay at Sharming Inn Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be a 2-minute drive from Red Sea and 5 minutes from Naama Bay. This family-friendly hotel is 5.5 mi (8.9 km) from Naama Bay Beach and 8.1 mi (13.1 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre. Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor tennis court and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include wireless internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Grab a bite at Restaurant Mozaic, one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 340 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies or patios. LED televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers.
address: Al Fanar, Second Sharm Al Shiekh,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Coral Sea Waterworld Sharm El Sheikh
description: When you stay at Coral Sea Water World Resort - All inclusive in Sharm El Sheikh, you'll be by the sea, within a 15-minute drive of Nabq Bay and SOHO Square. This all-inclusive property is 14.1 mi (22.8 km) from Naama Bay and 9.5 mi (15.3 km) from Shark's Bay. Pamper yourself with onsite body treatments and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. This property also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). This property is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Grab a bite to eat at one of the property's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit the beach bar or one of 2 bars/lounges, or 2 swim-up bars. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 376 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

name: Pickalbatros Palace Sharm
description: Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - "Aqua Park" located on the seafront with long jetty. Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - "Aqua Park" based on all-inclusive concepts. It offers a private beach, six swimming pools connected by lakes and waterfalls, and panoramic views of Tiran Island. The property is a 5-minute drive from Soho Square and 15 minutes away by car from Naama Bay.Located on the seafront with a private sandy beach.The hotel is based on All-Inclusive concept.Hotel offers (Aqua Park - Kids Aqua Park) on site.It offers 11 outdoor swimming pools.All Rooms feature with balcony or terrace.A safety box and minibar.The hotel offers 7 restaurants including A La Carte menu. The modern rooms and suites are situated in a prime location, along the shoreline. All units are spacious and include a flat-screen TV and furnished balconies with garden and sea views. Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - "Aqua Park" facilities include a Spa Centre that offers massage treatments, a sauna and a well-equipped gym. Guests can also experience scuba diving and coral reef snorkeling activities nearby. Children can have fun at the playground and the dedicated swimming pool. 11 swimming pools sandy coral beach offers 6 restaurants and one A La Carte Cocktails and light snacks are served at Food Court beach Restaurant Wi-Fi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
address: Montazah Area, Ras Nasrani Bay P.O. 421,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Jaz Fanara Resort
description: Straddling the cliffs of Ras Om El Sid. Jaz Fanara Resort boasts breathtaking views over the Red Sea and Ras Mohamed National Park.This elegant and four star retreat offers couples a romantic escape and families the perfect tune for some much needed quality time with contemporary room design that includes warm textiles plush furniture and accents of brushed steel. Its an oasis of style and luxury just two kilometres from Sharm El Sheikh city centre. Guests can enjoy a wide variety of activities from diving and snorkelling to simply relaxing on the private sandy beach. A host of on site facilities ensure that you will have as many ways to get active as you do to relax.
address: El Fanara St. Ras Om El Sid,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

description: The Grand Rotana Resort & Spa is Rotana's 5 star property in Sharm El Sheikh, "The City of Peace", offering a unique coastline, embraced by the spectacular land and seascapes of Mother Nature. With diving and snorkeling, windsurfing and other water sports, horse and camel riding, desert safaris and great nearby historic & religious attractions awaiting you. Organizing your launches, conferences and events will now be an unforgettable experience. You'll always find us at your convenience. The resort located on the shores of Shark's Bay 8 km away from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, 7 km away from Na'ama Bay and only 1.5 km away from Sharm El Sheikh International Congress Centre.

name: Iberotel Redsina
description: In the vicinity of the hotel`s own beach lies the hotel Iberotel Redsina. There is a shuttle between the hotel and the airport (for a fee). On the beach are sun loungers and beach towels available. The hotel has a 24h reception (check-in is possible around the clock), a lobby bar, Wi-Fi, internet access, a supermarket, cash machine, a hairdresser, a jacuzzi, a first aid kit as well as parking spaces (limited). Outside there is a children's pool, where pool towels are available for free. Furthermore, you can relax outdoors on the terrace. For the young hotel guests there is a playground. For very young guests, kid`s chairs can also be provided. You can store your luggage in the hotel's storage room. There is also a laundry service available at an additional cost to customers. Ironing equipment can be rented at the hotel for a fee. For your comfort, in addition to the concierge service the hotel page will ensure you are looked after. If necessary, you can contact the medical centre at any time (for a fee). For conventions and other business meetings, the hotel offers EXTRA_FEE conference rooms. If you want to explore the holiday region, you can use the car rental service close to the hotel (extra fee). Euro/Master Card and Visa are accepted as means of payment. Due to its barrier-free facilities , such as barrier-free entrances and wheelchair accessible rooms, the hotel is also suitable for wheelchair users. Catering As catering services the hotel offers all-inclusive. Breakfast is offered continental or from the buffet. For the meals, there are a restaurant (calorie-reduced dishes) and several bars. Distances Airport: approximately at 8 km Sports & Leisure A sauna (extra fee) awaits you for relaxation. The hotel also offers massages (extra fee) and beauty treatments (extra fee). Infants can be looked after in the hotel`s own baby club. For older children the care takes place in the children`s club. Junior hotel guests can also let off steam in the mini disco. Additional...

name: Pickalbatros Laguna Club Resort Sharm El Sheikh
description: Pickalbatros Laguna Club Resort Sharm El Sheikh has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a private beach area and bar in Sharm El Sheikh. Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a water park. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking resort features a hot tub and evening entertainment. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Pickalbatros Laguna Club Resort Sharm El Sheikh offers some units with pool views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Pizza cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis and darts, and the area is popular for snorkeling. Staff speak Arabic, German, English and Italian at the reception. Nabq Bay Beach is 800 meters from Pickalbatros Laguna Club Resort Sharm El Sheikh, while Royal Albatros Moderna Beach is 2.6 km from the property. Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is 11 km away.
address: Nabq bay,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Jaz Mirabel Resort
description: Less than ten minutes away from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and 500 metres from its own private beach the five star Jaz Mirabel Resort is a refuge of relaxation on the Red Sea. It stands on a lagoon directly across from Tiran Island and the views are incredible from its balconies and restaurant terraces. Soak up the sun stretch out in the shade or don your snorkel and mask to join the parade of tropical fish along the house reef.

name: Jaz Belvedere Resort

Traditional Arabian and Moroccan architecture combine desert pastels. palms and grand arches with the island of Tiran looming over the sea in the distance. Just 10 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and 20 km from the city center.The resort offers a full roster of activities leisure facilities and restaurants and bars. The star attraction here is the pristine beach.Your holiday on the Sinai is bound to become an instant classic.
